intent_atoms.description: Automate strict concurrency checks across all build and test phases to enforce thread-safe concurrent design patterns.
All platform-independent targets compile and test successfully with zero strict concurrency warnings.
Pre-push hook executes build and test with strict concurrency, logs published to Documentation/Quality/.
CI workflow runs strict concurrency checks on every PR and push to main, failing automatically on any concurrency warnings or errors.
Strict concurrency logs are uploaded as workflow artifacts with 14-day retention.
Documentation updated to reflect automation gate status and completion date.
Swift 6.0+ has strict concurrency enabled by default; .enableUpcomingFeature("StrictConcurrency") is redundant and should not be used in targets.
Conditional package dependencies for iOS/macOS-only libraries to avoid unused dependency warnings on Linux builds.
Separate cache key for strict concurrency checks in CI to prevent interference with main build cache.
Pre-push hook logs are timestamped and separated by build/test phases for easier debugging.

functional_units.name: Package.swift Strict Concurrency Configuration
functional_units.description: Enables Swift's StrictConcurrency feature for all platform‑independent targets via .enableUpcomingFeature("StrictConcurrency")

functional_units.name: Pre‑Push Hook Quality Gate
functional_units.description: Runs SwiftLint, strict concurrency build/test verification, large file detection, and secret scanning before a push; logs output to Documentation/Quality/

functional_units.name: GitHub Actions CI Strict Concurrency Job
functional_units.description: Builds and tests all platform‑independent targets with strict concurrency enabled on ubuntu-22.04 using Swift 6.0.1; uploads logs as artifacts

functional_units.name: Documentation Quality README
functional_units.description: Provides guidance on quality assurance logs and their usage

functional_units.name: Conditional Package Dependencies Update
functional_units.description: Moves iOS/macOS‑only dependencies into conditional blocks to avoid unused dependency warnings on Linux builds

functional_units.name: Removal of Redundant StrictConcurrency Flags
functional_units.description: Strips .enableUpcomingFeature("StrictConcurrency") from targets after Swift 6.0 makes it default

functional_units.name: CI Environment Alignment
functional_units.description: Standardizes CI workflows to use Swift 6.0.x across all platforms and updates .swift-version and README
